entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain except rain along parts of the coast. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
